attributes.additional_details: There was a petition around a few weeks back asking for a general election. The government’s response was “ at present we don’t believe it’s the right time”. So as of now we are telling you we demand a general election. You work for us not the other way around. We a are fed up of the lies, lockdowns, sleaze, and everything else you have promised and not delivered.
attributes.background: Call an immediate general election due to restrictions an incompetence of this government

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you may like to sign:

Call an immediate general election due to authoritarian Coronavirus measures
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596452
